definition: hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: A crane with a flat car for excavator transporting.
sentences.chinese: 十分站内吊车与载运怪手的平车。

sentences.english: An excavator was tightening up sugarcane in the car.
sentences.chinese: 工作人员正以怪手压紧车上的甘蔗。

sentences.english: Track salt carriers modified from excavators have also been preserved in the depot.
sentences.chinese: 台盐自行改装自怪手的履带式运盐车。

definition: delicate hands/woman's tender and soft hands
with all one's might/with sudden force/violently/to slam
the five fingers of one's hand
(idiom) no sooner said than done/before you know it
pinyin: shuo1 shi2 chi2 , na4 shi2 kuai4

definition: to claw wildly/to scratch frantically/to arrest people indiscriminately
bloody mouth (from devouring freshly killed prey)
